name: Block Sim Online
description:
This game is under development and might have some bug issues...

Joining servers in development...

more blocks...

fixing buttons...

more capabilities like sprinting and crouching and many more...

Left-click to place

right-click to auto click or place multiple blocks... try holding right-click.

The middle mouse button does the same thing as right-click...

WASD to move and space to jump....

'r' to change block type...

'E' to either lock cursor or unlock cursor...

Esc just unlocks cursor...

More updates soon!
